company_description: Shift Technology is a software company that provides artificial intelligence solutions for insurance fraud detection and claims automation, helping insurers reduce fraud risk and improve operational efficiency.
founders: Christian Ohler, George Arison, Joel Washington, Minnie Ingersoll, Morgan Knutson
universities: Ecole Normale Superieure, MPRI, Ecole Polytech
embedding_text: Shift Technology is a software company that provides artificial intelligence solutions for insurance fraud detection and claims automation, helping insurers reduce fraud risk and improve operational efficiency.
